\begin{document}
\Large

\chapter*{Converse GAN}

Implementations of the models in the paper "Generating Informative and Diverse Conversational Responses via Adversarial Information Maximization" by Yizhe Zhang, Michel Galley, Jianfeng Gao, Zhe Gan, Xiujun Li, Chris Brockett, Bill Dolan, NeurIPS 2018

\section*{Prerequisite:}

\begin{itemize}
\item Tensorflow (version $>$1.2)
\item CUDA, cudnn
\end{itemize}

\section*{Run}

\begin{itemize}
\item Run: \texttt{./run.sh} 
\end{itemize}

\section*{Data:}

\begin{itemize}
\item Not directly sharable due to copyright issue. 
\item Data format and screening criteria will be released soon. Stay tuned.
\end{itemize}

For any question or suggestions, feel free to contact yizhe.zhang@microsoft.com

\section*{Citation}

\begin{itemize}
\item Arxiv link: \href{https://arxiv.org/abs/1809.05972}{https://arxiv.org/abs/1809.05972}
```latex
@inproceedings\{zhang2018generating,

\end{itemize}
